author: The Associated Press
title: China to lift coronavirus lockdown in most of Hubei province
description: Chinese authorities say they will end a two-month lockdown of most of coronavirus-hit Hubei province at midnight, as domestic cases of what has become a global pandemic subside.
content:
Chinese authorities said Tuesday they will end a two-month lockdown of most of coronavirus-hit Hubei province at midnight, as domestic cases of what has become a global pandemic subside. 
People with a clean bill of health will be allowed to leave, the provi… [+4103 chars]
